profileAlternative.name: Ariel Mariani
profileAlternative.headline: Interactive- Multimedia Designer
profileAlternative.summary:
I am an Interactive Designer (aka Multimedia Designer), passionate and focused on web development with extensive knowledge in the FrontEnd field. Curious about the new trends and tools that allow me to do my job in the most efficient, fast and scalable way. The background I have in design allows me to be attentive to the details related to the User Experience, and thus be able to generate better content with which the users will interact.
I had the great opportunity to work developing web applications in Melbourne, Australia, that helped me a lot to improve not only my developing skills but also my English communication. I strive to share my knowledge daily through articles in blogs, forums and video tutorials, which provides me a constant contact with the world of programming and design.

positions.title: Ssr Web Developer
positions.description: Front-end development using JavaScript, mainly the AngularJS framework for creating and maintaining the Disney Cruise Line SPA, and using different tools like task runners (Grunt), package/dependencies manager (npm) and Karma for test runners.

positions.title: UX Front-End and Back-End Developer
positions.description: Web development using mainly Laravel 4 for the needed APIs while using Javascript for the frontend.

positions.title: Computer Technician
positions.description:
Management and repair of computers and devices of the eight branches of the company.
Technical Service for customers.

positions.title: Web Developer, Graphic and Web Designer
positions.description: Web design and development. Creating intranets systems to solve issues within the company.

items: Inicial Programming, with Java and Oracle
